title: How to See People's Birthdays on Snapchat

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. This app icon looks like a ghost on a yellow background that you can find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. You'll see this in the top left corner of your screen next to the magnifying glass.

steps.title: Tap My Friends.
steps.content: Tap My Friends . It's under the "Friends" header.

steps.title: Scroll down and look for a cake emoji next to someone's name.
steps.content: Scroll down and look for a cake emoji next to someone's name. If it's anyone's birthday, a cake emoji will display to the right of their name.
